summary: Asset management app draft v1 deployed; user requests Edit/Delete options.

existing_features.title: Extend frontend React Query hooks in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts to include mutations for the new update/delete backend methods (equipment, spare parts, maintenance, cataloguing, documents) and ensure appropriate query invalidation so lists refresh after edits/deletes.

Add Edit and Delete controls in the Equipment List UI (frontend/src/pages/EquipmentListPage.tsx) so users can edit or delete an equipment item directly from the list, including a confirmation step before deletion.

Add Edit and Delete controls for Spare Parts in frontend/src/pages/SparePartsPage.tsx for the “View Spare Parts by Equipment” table, including a confirmation step before deletion and a way to modify the spare part fields (name, description, quantity, supplier).

Add Edit and Delete controls for Maintenance records in frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx for the “View Maintenance Records” table, including a confirmation step before deletion and a way to modify maintenanceType, status, lastMaintenanceDate, and nextMaintenanceDate.

Add Edit and Delete controls for Cataloguing records in frontend/src/pages/CataloguingPage.tsx within the “Existing Records” list, enabling loading a selected record into the form for editing and allowing deletion with confirmation.

Add Delete controls for Documents in frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx in the “View Documents by Equipment” table, with a confirmation step before deletion; if documentType editing is implemented on the backend, also provide an Edit action to change documentType.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Edit and Delete options (CRUD) to existing screens/flows.

Add backend update and delete operations for Equipment records, including an update method that modifies an existing equipment item by equipmentNumber and a delete method that removes an equipment item by equipmentNumber.

Add backend update and delete operations for Spare Part records, allowing modification and removal of a spare part using partNumber (and any other identifiers needed to uniquely locate the spare part in current storage).
Add backend update and delete operations for Maintenance records, allowing modification and removal by maintenanceId.

Add backend update and delete operations for Cataloguing records, enabling editing and deletion of a specific existing cataloguing record for an equipment item (using a stable identifier available in the current model, such as list index for that equipmentNumber).

Add backend update and delete operations for Document records, enabling at minimum deletion of a document by docId; optionally allow editing document metadata (documentType) by docId without re-uploading the file.

projectName: Add Edit and Delete options for asset management records
